metadata.shortInfo:
Strain variant data from https://www.elegansvariation.org/. For more information see Cook DE, Zdraljevic S, Roberts JP, Andersen EC. CeNDR, the Caenorhabditis elegans natural diversity resource. Nucleic Acids Res. 2017 Jan 4;45(D1):D650-D657. doi: 10.1093/nar/gkw893. Epub 2016 Oct 3. PubMed PMID: 27701074; PubMed Central PMCID: PMC5210618. Color codes from annotated severity:
  • red:high
  • gold (dark yellow):moderate
  • cyan (light blue): low
  • purple: modifier
  • black: no annotation
  • green: annotation but not in the above list
